full_title: Welcome to the Party by Death By Stereo
title: Welcome to the Party
lyrics:
2 ContributorsWelcome to the Party LyricsYeah right, this you can't infect this mind
Inside, one thousand wars we fight
Hatred this is your promise land
Tonight, we drink, we ****, we fight

We are the ones that you despise, chaos undefined
Downfall all around me, welcome to the party
Killing you inside, watching as we rise
You will never stop me, welcome to my party

This is the end of your regime
Destroy your ****** third reich routine
Burn down this world that crushes dreams
Tonight with fire we will fight

We are the ones that you despise, chaos undefined
Downfall all around me, welcome to the party
Killing you inside, watching as we rise
You will never stop me, welcome to my party
Chaos!!!
